trans-unit.source: Exposes the cells in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> to UI Automation.
Gets the control type for the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.

If this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer"></xref> is associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock"></xref> element, this method returns <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Text"></xref>; otherwise, this method returns <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Custom"></xref>.
Gets the name of the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.
The name of the element.
Gets the control pattern for the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer"></xref>.
One of the enumeration values.
If patternInterface is or , this method returns the current .

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer"></xref> is understood by the end user as interactive or the user might understand the element as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement"></xref>.

If this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer"></xref> is associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock"></xref> element, this method returns `true`; otherwise, this method returns a list of child elements.
Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.
Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
The number of columns spanned.
Gets a UI Automation provider that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern"></xref> and represents the container of the cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
A UI Automation provider that implements the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern"></xref> and represents the cell or item container.
Gets the ordinal number of the row that contains the cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the row containing the cell or item.
Gets the number of rows spanned by a cell or item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridItemProvider> interface.
The number of rows spanned.
Retrieves a collection of UI Automation providers that represent all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.
A collection of UI Automation providers.
Retrieves a collection of UI Automation providers that represent all the row headers associated with a table item or cell.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewCellAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITableItemProvider> interface.
A collection of UI Automation providers.
